title: "Shocking, Unfair": Outrage After Algeria Boxer's Olympics Win Over Italian
content: Forty-six seconds into her match against Algeria's Imane Khelif, Italian boxer Angela Carini abandoned the bout. She left the ring in tears, but the result also caused a huge uproar on social media.
summary: Forty-six seconds into her match against Algeria's Imane Khelif, Italian boxer Angela Carini abandoned the bout. She left the ring in tears, but the result also caused a huge uproar on social media.

title: Biden Administration Net Neutrality Rules Blocked By US Court: Report
content: A US appeals court on Thursday blocked the Federal Communications Commission's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge.
summary: A US appeals court on Thursday blocked the Federal Communications Commission's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge.

title: Elon Musk Shares "Men Don't Belong In Women's Sports" Post Amid Gender Row
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has backed Italian boxer Angela Carini after her loss to Algerian fighter Imane Khelif at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has backed Italian boxer Angela Carini after her loss to Algerian fighter Imane Khelif at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday.

title: US Man Asks Flight Attendant For Sex, Opens Plane Door Mid-Air
content: A New Jersey man has been arrested for his alleged disruptive and life-threatening behaviour on an American Airlines flight.
summary: A New Jersey man has been arrested for his alleged disruptive and life-threatening behaviour on an American Airlines flight.

title: US Committed To Defend Israel Against All Threats From Iran: Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden told Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday that Washington is committed to defending Israel's security "against all threats from Iran," the White House said, after the assassination of a top Hamas leader in Tehran.
summary: US President Joe Biden told Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday that Washington is committed to defending Israel's security "against all threats from Iran," the White House said, after the assassination of a top Hamas leader in Tehran.

title: Hamas Chief Ismail Haniyeh To Be Buried In Qatar
content: Qatar on Friday is due to hold funeral ceremonies for Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh after his killing in Tehran, an attack blamed on Israel that has deepened fears of a regional escalation.
summary: Qatar on Friday is due to hold funeral ceremonies for Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh after his killing in Tehran, an attack blamed on Israel that has deepened fears of a regional escalation.

title: Biden "Overwhelmed" As Prisoners Freed By Russia Are Reunited With Family
content: Tears of joy flowed in the Oval Office the moment families of prisoners such as Evan Gershkovich, freed by Russia in the biggest such swap since the Cold War, first spoke by phone to their loved ones, a White House video showed on Thursday.
summary: Tears of joy flowed in the Oval Office the moment families of prisoners such as Evan Gershkovich, freed by Russia in the biggest such swap since the Cold War, first spoke by phone to their loved ones, a White House video showed on Thursday.

title: US Regrets Failure To Get Alexei Navalny Into Russia Swap Before His Death
content: Amid celebrations at getting a slew of US citizens and Kremlin opponents out of Russian prisons, the White House had one public regret Thursday: failure to get out an even bigger name -- Alexei Navalny.
summary: Amid celebrations at getting a slew of US citizens and Kremlin opponents out of Russian prisons, the White House had one public regret Thursday: failure to get out an even bigger name -- Alexei Navalny.

title: Gay Waiter In US Left In Tears After Homophobic Message And Insulting Tip
content: The receipt, which included the slur and the customer's name, was shared online, leading to public outcry. The customer later issued an apology on Facebook, but the post and their social media accounts have since been removed.
summary: The receipt, which included the slur and the customer's name, was shared online, leading to public outcry. The customer later issued an apology on Facebook, but the post and their social media accounts have since been removed.

title: As Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris Heats Up, Return Of "Bertherism" In US
content: Donald Trump is facing a fierce backlash for questioning the race of US election rival Kamala Harris, but to those acquainted with the Republican's long history of inflammatory language and behaviour around the issue, the smear was nothing new.
summary: Donald Trump is facing a fierce backlash for questioning the race of US election rival Kamala Harris, but to those acquainted with the Republican's long history of inflammatory language and behaviour around the issue, the smear was nothing new.

title: Kamala Harris' Pride At Being Black Shines Amid Donald Trump's Jibes
content: Former president Donald Trump, who has a long history of making incendiary comments about race, has stepped up his attacks on his 2024 White House rival Kamala Harris by claiming she "happened to turn Black" for political advantage.
summary: Former president Donald Trump, who has a long history of making incendiary comments about race, has stepped up his attacks on his 2024 White House rival Kamala Harris by claiming she "happened to turn Black" for political advantage.

title: School Children Are Wilting In Poorly Insulated Classrooms In Japan
content: Pupils are wilting in ageing school buildings in Japan because poor insulation is cancelling out the effect of air conditioning, leading to drowsy kids and testy teachers.
summary: Pupils are wilting in ageing school buildings in Japan because poor insulation is cancelling out the effect of air conditioning, leading to drowsy kids and testy teachers.

title: Death Awaited Hamas Chief For 2 Months In A Posh Tehran Locality
content: Death waited for Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh for over two months. A bomb was secretly smuggled into the guesthouse in Iran where he was expected to arrive, reports The New York Times citing several officials in the US and the Middle East.
summary: Death waited for Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh for over two months. A bomb was secretly smuggled into the guesthouse in Iran where he was expected to arrive, reports The New York Times citing several officials in the US and the Middle East.

title: Who Is Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, Pakistani Terrorist Behind 9/11 Attacks
content: Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, the mastermind of the September 11, 2001 hijackings -- the deadliest ever attacks on US soil -- has dedicated his life to plotting against the West.
summary: Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, the mastermind of the September 11, 2001 hijackings -- the deadliest ever attacks on US soil -- has dedicated his life to plotting against the West.

title: US Recognizes Maduro's Opponent As Venezuela Election Winner: Antony Blinken
content: The United States on Thursday recognized Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's opponent and opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez as the winner of Venezuela's disputed presidential election, rejecting Maduro's claim of victory.
summary: The United States on Thursday recognized Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's opponent and opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez as the winner of Venezuela's disputed presidential election, rejecting Maduro's claim of victory.

title: Trump Raised $139 Million In July, Has $327 Million Cash On Hand
content: Republican presidential nominee and former president Donald Trump has said that his campaign raised USD 139 million in July and has USD 327 million cash on hand.
summary: Republican presidential nominee and former president Donald Trump has said that his campaign raised USD 139 million in July and has USD 327 million cash on hand.

title: Who Is Vadim Krasikov, The Assassin Freed In Russian Prisoner Swap
content: Vadim Krasikov, a Russian freed from jail in Germany on Friday in a prisoner swap between Moscow and the West, was convicted of the murder in 2019 of a former Chechen militant as he walked in broad daylight in a park in central Berlin.
summary: Vadim Krasikov, a Russian freed from jail in Germany on Friday in a prisoner swap between Moscow and the West, was convicted of the murder in 2019 of a former Chechen militant as he walked in broad daylight in a park in central Berlin.

title: 2 Indians Arrested With Drugs Worth $10 Million In US
content: US officials have arrested two Indian nationals with drugs worth USD 10 million, the Department of Justice said.
summary: US officials have arrested two Indian nationals with drugs worth USD 10 million, the Department of Justice said.

title: Intel Says It Will Sack 18,000 Staff, Cut $20 Billion In Expenses
content: US chip maker Intel said Thursday it will slash more than 15 percent of its workforce as it streamlines operations.The plan to cut approximately $20 billion in expenses this year came as Intel reported a loss of $1.6 billion in the recently ended qua
